description:
You need immediate Google, Yahoo and Bing search engine rankings and you need them NOW! Not tomorrow, not next week or month but RIGHT NOW. Local Seo (search engine optimization) is an online marketing practices which optimizing all of your content, products and services to make them more visible in local search listings online.

Budget constraints put local businesses in a tough position when it comes to both global and local Seo marketing. Building your business' online presence is crucial for establishing trust with your areas local consumer base.

In this course, we teach students the basics of establishing a local Seo Marketing
campaign in the following areas;

1. How local Seo immediately increases your website traffic

2. Which areas of your site should be immediately 'tweaked' to drive profit results

3. Which local directories send the quickest and largest amount of website traffic to your offer(s)

4. How to DESTROY your local competitors using one simple 'trick' Google LOVES!

5. How to easily set-up your company's social media local listings in less than 10 minutes

These are just the tip of the iceberg! We want you to enroll in our course NOW to super-charge online sales results and brand presence.
title: Local SEO Marketing
